Articles.Content: 1601: you see me experimenting on bill with some radioactive chemicals.
1602. There is a gap of 10 meters to the next door. Oops, someone forgot to find the floor contractors. Guess an anti-gravity thing would be nice.

You find a jet pack and continue to the next floor.

1603There is nothing on the next floor oddly enough.

Edited April 15, 2017 by 53miner53
Forgot the number
1604: You see a potato battery being pecked by a bird.
1605:There is 25 Russian gangsters that shoot everything they see and there is also a large statue right in the middle of the room and there is also a 26th gangster who's appareantly me.
1606: There are that many sticks.
1607: there are that many stuffed animals on display behind a glass pane.
1608: An EMDX SD70ACe-T4 demonstrator unit with the same number.
1609: You wonder how many floors on this building are empty. This one certainly is.
1610: My Fleet sets up a headquarters. How high up here are we anyways? I think we're at Moon height
1611: you look out of the window and get depressed about walking the way down...
1612 There is a hole to the bottom that says to jump down it. It magically puts you up a floor.

1613: This room appears to have mirrors on every side, endlessly reflecting you, but when you look closer, you find that they are actually windows into parallel universes, and each of your doppelgangers is doing something different. Particularly unnerving is how many of them appear to be dead on the floor of an endlessly tall building.

1614: this floor contains Weeping Angels.

You back up the stairs slowly, being extra cautious not to blink....
1615 You find a 1:100 scale model of the netherlands. Nothing else.
1616: you find a 1:100 scale model of the world, except the Netherlands. There is a conspicuous hole where the Netherlands is supposed to be...
1617: you find a 1:100 map of the world with every country painted orange and the title says: "The Netherlands in 2030"...

floor 1618:

nothing all that important, just a lot of cats

wait, CATS!!! LET ME PET THEM!!! CAAAAATS!!!

the elevator closes the door at the last moment before you get at the cats, and your nose gets cut off, you are now noseless

Floor sixteen thousand and nineteen:

Mr crabs' money bath
1620: There is a cool demonstration of the Mayflower landing at Cape Cod (or there abouts) in 2:35 scale
1621: Nothing special apart from a Yamato battleship.
1622: Is that an Avenger with a torpedo I hear?

1623: A bunch of stuff happens in colonial America.

Edited April 25, 2017 by UnionPacific1983WP
1624: You are greeted by an angry pitchfork mob and you quickly run upstairs to the next floor.

1625: Break Time!

(everything in this room is broken)
